<div id="herobox-mini">
    <div id="hero-content">
        <span id="controls">

            <span id="close"><a title="click to dismiss">&times;</a></span>

        <div id="blurb">

    <script>
        $('#tell-me-more').click(function () {
            var clickSource = $("body").attr("class") + '-mini';
            if ($("body").hasClass("questions-page")) {
                clickSource = 'questionpagemini';
            }
            if ($("body").hasClass("home-page")) {
                clickSource = 'homepagemini';
            }

            StackExchange.using("gps", function () {
                StackExchange.gps.track("aboutpage.click", { aboutclick_location: clickSource } , true);
            });
        });
        $('#herobox-mini #close').click(function () {
            StackExchange.using("gps", function () {
                StackExchange.gps.track("hero.action", { hero_action_type: "close" }, true);
            });
            $.cookie("hero", "none", { path: "/" });
            var $hero = $("#herobox-mini");
            $hero.slideUp('fast', function () { $hero.remove(); });
            return false;
        });
    </script>
</div>
			<!--googleon: all-->
			<div id="question-header">
			<h1 itemprop="name"><a href="/questions/19141131/combining-multiple-flexsliders-with-masonry-jquery" class="question-hyperlink">combining multiple flexsliders with masonry (jquery)</a></h1>
		</div>
			<div id="mainbar">

			

<div class="question" data-questionid="19141131"  id="question">
    
                <script type="text/javascript">
                var ados = ados || {};ados.run = ados.run || [];
                ados.run.push(function() { ados_add_placement(22,8277,"adzerk1875702291",4).setZone(43) ; });                    
            </script>
            <div class="everyonelovesstackoverflow" id="adzerk1875702291">
            </div>  


    <table>
        <tr>
            <td class="votecell">
                

<div class="vote">
    <input type="hidden" name="_id_" value="19141131">
    <a class="vote-up-off" title="This question shows research effort; it is useful and clear">up vote</a>
    <span class="vote-count-post ">0</span>
    <a class="vote-down-off" title="This question does not show any research effort; it is unclear or not useful">down vote</a>
    
    <a class="star-off" href="#" title="This is a favorite question (click again to undo)">favorite</a>
    <div class="favoritecount"><b></b></div>   

</div>

            </td>
            
<td class="postcell">
<div>
    <div class="post-text" itemprop="description">

        <p>I have a blog page that uses masonry to position all blog items. Some of these blog items have a single image, some have a single video, and some have multiple images. For the ones with multiple images I use flexslider to click through the images. All works, except that masonry leaves a space beneath each blog item that uses the flexslider after the page loads. The space is as tall as the hidden images in the slider. When you resize the browser window even the slightest bit, masonry kicks in again and puts everything in the right position.</p>

<p>This is what I have:</p>

<p>HTML</p>

<pre><code>&lt;section id="blog" class="windows"&gt;
  &lt;div class="item"&gt;
    &lt;div class="blog_flexslider"&gt;
      &lt;ul class="slides"&gt;
        &lt;li&gt;&lt;img src="_img/blog/blog1-1.jpg" alt="" /&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
        &lt;li&gt;&lt;img src="_img/blog/blog1-2.jpg" alt="" /&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
        &lt;li&gt;&lt;img src="_img/blog/blog1-3.jpg" alt="" /&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
      &lt;/ul&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;h2&gt;Title&lt;/h2&gt;
    &lt;h4 class="date"&gt;25 / 09 / 2013&lt;/h4&gt;
    &lt;p&gt;text&lt;/p&gt;
  &lt;/div&gt;

  &lt;div class="item"&gt;
    &lt;div class="blog_flexslider"&gt;
      &lt;ul class="slides"&gt;
        &lt;li&gt;&lt;img src="_img/blog/blog2-1.jpg" alt="" /&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
        &lt;li&gt;&lt;img src="_img/blog/blog2-2.jpg" alt="" /&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
      &lt;/ul&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;h2&gt;Title&lt;/h2&gt;
    &lt;h4 class="date"&gt;19 / 09 / 2013&lt;/h4&gt;
    &lt;p&gt;text&lt;/p&gt;
  &lt;/div&gt;

  &lt;div class="item"&gt;
    &lt;img src="_img/blog/blog3-1.jpg" alt="" /&gt;
    &lt;h2&gt;Title&lt;/h2&gt;
    &lt;h4 class="date"&gt;12 / 09 / 2013&lt;/h4&gt;
    &lt;p&gt;text&lt;/p&gt;
  &lt;/div&gt;    
&lt;/section&gt;
</code></pre>

<p>JS</p>

<pre><code>$(window).load(function() {

  $('#blog').masonry({
    itemSelector: '.item'
  });

  $('.blog_flexslider').flexslider({
    direction: "vertical",
    animationSpeed: 300,
    controlNav: false,
    directionNav: true
  });

});
</code></pre>

<p>I really hope there is something small that I'm just not seeing! Hope someone has any ideas on this. <a href="http://www.11amtoday.nl/klanten/brandweerboot/v4/" rel="nofollow">Working example of the site I'm working on right here</a>.
Blog page is located all the way on the bottom. </p>

    </div>
    <div class="post-taglist">
        <a href="/questions/tagged/javascript" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged 'javascript'" rel="tag">javascript</a> <a href="/questions/tagged/jquery" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged 'jquery'" rel="tag">jquery</a> <a href="/questions/tagged/flexslider" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged 'flexslider'" rel="tag">flexslider</a> 
    </div>
    <table class="fw">
    <tr>
    <td class="vt">

    </td>
    <td align="right" class="post-signature">

						<tr>
							<td>
								<p class="label-key">asked</p>
							</td>
							<td style="padding-left: 10px">
								<p class="label-key" title="2013-10-02 15:48:56Z"><b>4 days ago</b></p>
							</td>
						</tr>
						<tr>
							<td>
								<p class="label-key">viewed</p>
							</td>

							<td style="padding-left: 10px">
								<p class="label-key">
									<b>10 times</b>
								</p>
							</td>
						</tr>
					</table>
				</div>
						
			            <script type="text/javascript">
                var ados = ados || {};ados.run = ados.run || [];
                ados.run.push(function() { ados_add_placement(22,8277,"adzerk245212475",17).setZone(45) ; });                    
            </script>
            <div class="everyonelovesstackoverflow" id="adzerk245212475">
            </div>  
    <div id="hireme">
        <script type="text/javascript">

    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var ados = ados || {};
    ados.run = ados.run || [];
    ados.run.push(function () { ados_setKeywords('javascript,jquery,flexslider');; ados_load(); });         
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">var _gaq=_gaq||[];_gaq.push(['_setAccount','UA-5620270-1']);
        _gaq.push(['_setCustomVar', 1, 'tags', '|javascript|jquery|flexslider|']); 
_gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);
    var _qevents = _qevents || [];
    (function () {
        var ssl='https:'==document.location.protocol,
            s=document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
            ga=document.createElement('script');
        ga.type='text/javascript';
        ga.async=true;
        ga.src=(ssl?'https://ssl':'http://www')+'.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
        s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga,s);
        var sc=document.createElement('script');
        sc.type='text/javascript';
        sc.async=true;
        sc.src=(ssl?'https://secure':'http://edge')+'.quantserve.com/quant.js';
        s.parentNode.insertBefore(sc,s);
    })();
